attributes.review: this app took forever to download, i’m talking HOURS. not to mention the content in this app is despicable. also don’t plan on actually using the app because it’s so slow. it’s crashes every. single. time. i really hope mr         🍊president 🍊sees these reviews because this app is going to get removed soon.😌✨gen z will forever be too powerful 😘
attributes.title: horrible do not get 😿

attributes.review: I do not think this app is doing a job being updated and it’s software. For me it is super glitchy, it doesn’t really seem to have been updated and it is also kicking me out of the app at random times. It has gotten to the point that I can’t even use the app. Either fix this or take the app down.
attributes.title: Not a good buy

attributes.review: I’m not much of a trump fan. I downloaded this app to help my friends. When I first opened it, it started to become very glitchy. To the point where it won’t let touch anything. I have tried to reset my phone but nothing’s working, I really wish they fixed this app. It has gotten way to far that I have to give it a very bad review.
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: Took 13 entire days to download and once it did my iPhone was the most laggy it’s ever been. It used up my entire data for this month just from background running. I am furious!! And on top of all of that it would not let me delete it. I had to take it into the apple store just to get it off my phone. Worst app ever!
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: Didn’t even have to open the app to know it was completely garbage 💕my biggest regret was having to download this horrid app to leave a review😽😍Wait was that a Chuncky Cheeto or our president? These spot the difference games are getting harder🤪🤨🤩Anywaysss, toddles and if you get this app for serious and real reasons- you’re part of the issue😘🥰😍😇
attributes.title: ✨Never again~!✨

attributes.review: i downloaded the app so i could keep up with trump but everyone i sat on the toilet it would play very loud annoying music & it would make my toilet vibrate which was very uncomfortable. then my lights would flicker on & off. i don’t know how but it just happened & the only way it would stop would be to delete it. 100% DO NOT RECOMMEND. it’s the worst app on the planet.😡
attributes.title: HORRENDOUS😤

attributes.review: This is the most disturbing thing anyone has ever downloaded after this review I hope to forget it even exists. It’s scary texting and you download it not knowing what’s going to happen next it’s NOT what you expect. It’s worse. It hurts to even write this because of how much it sucked... don’t even try downloading it for a second. It WILL ruin you.
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!

attributes.review: As a Democrat I was s0 excited to download this app on my phone but once i received it my heart shattered... Not only did it take all day to download but the things shown and talked about are disgusting. Now don’t get me on the software itself🙄 Anyways I highly recommend you don’t even think about getting this app.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE i wish i could give it 0 stars

attributes.review: Uhhhh when I downloaded it, it did something like use my location or something like that???? And it like DRAINED my battery. Dude how am I supposed to be on other apps that ACTUALLY matter if this thing drains my battery. Not only that but it took all my info so now I’m sure the gov. has it. Not impressed at all. #dumptrump #isaidwhoeverdrainedmybatteryyourmomsahoe
attributes.title: Yah it’s a no go for me...

attributes.review:
the app is TERRIBLE! Took several hours to download even with full service/data and full wifi.
Once the app downloaded it wouldn't stop crashing and sending me push notifications even though i had turned them off.
I finally got the app to work, and it couldn't navigate through it at all!!
Trash app.
attributes.title: AWFUL!!!
